description: This file defines a React functional component named 'App' that manages a theme toggle between light and dark modes. It includes UI elements such as a button to switch themes, an image logo, and links, with styling imported from external CSS and logo files.

methods.name: App
methods.description: React functional component that manages theme state and renders UI elements for theme toggling.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to switch the theme state between 'light' and 'dark'.
